name: dadmaterial

”Alexa, start dad material”
”Alexa, open dad material”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dad material
des:
Play an interactive story on cats, humane cats and a story about Samuel a cat abandoned at a shelter. Many cats die in cages as they wait in deplorable conditions for a loving home. Samuel is one such disabled cat, and is a true story. Bitty and Shruti are two other such "lucky" cats.
As you read this story, many cats are in silent terms with their fate, illegally confined in cages, malnourished and exploited, many even die in a cage. 
PETA has endorsed a policy of kind euthanasia to end this misery and discourage keeping a pet if you cannot commit to one.
Do you want to save one today and offer unconditional love and affection to one? Are you committed to adopting one, much like a family member?
This skill has premium content on adopting a cat near you and will soon be updated with interactive premium media content.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
